episodes.title: What Are Some Warning Signs That You Might Be in a Cult?
episodes.description:
Full interview: https://vimeo.com/1086151044

A fascinating conversation with lawyer Carol Merchasin, known as the ‘the cult assassin’, about what laws exist around cults and how people get pulled into them.

Tune in to The News Forum for more news, updates, and in-depth interviews from a Canadian perspective where all voices matter. Check your local listings for channel details. #thenewsforum #canadianjusticeca 

To watch the full program, visit our website: https://www.thenewsforum.ca/series/canadianjustice
